name: find-nearest-tailwind-color
title: Find nearest tailwind color
description: This extension allows you to bring your custom color and find the closest color from the Tailwind CSS palette.
author: michael_nabil230

commands.name: index
commands.title: Find Nearest Tailwind Color
commands.description: This extension allows you to bring your custom color and find the closest color from the Tailwind CSS palette.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
